mapper.select: SELECT oi.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID , oi.ORDER_DATE AS ORDER_DATE , oi.STATUS AS STATUS_CODE , mc.SUB_NAME AS STATUS_NAME , oi.CLIENT_ID AS CLIENT_ID , c.CLIENT_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME , oi.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID , i.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME , oi.DELIVERY_DATE AS DELIVERY_DATE , oi.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY , oi.NOTE AS NOTE , oi.PRICE AS PRICE FROM ORDER_INTAKE oi INNER JOIN MES_COMMON mc ON oi.STATUS = mc.CLASSIFICATION_ID INNER JOIN CLIENT c ON oi.CLIENT_ID = c.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN ITEM i ON oi.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID
SELECT ITEM_ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_TYPE FROM ITEM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ORDER_ID, '-([0-9]+)$', 1, 1, NULL, 1))), 0) + 1 AS MAX_NUMBER FROM ORDER_INTAKE WHERE ORDER_ID LIKE '%' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%'
